title: Sum of Agruments
description: Create a script that takes two arguments and prints the sum to stdout

title: Greatest Argument
description: Create a script that takes any number of arguments, all of which are numbers, and prints the sum to stdout

title: Range Creator
description: Create a script that takes two options, -s and -s, and prints each number from start (-s) to end (-e) on a new line

title: Word Finder
description: Create a script that takes searches for a word in a text file and prints the number of occurrences of that word to stdout. The script takes an option -s (the search term) and a filename

title: Name Counter
description: Create a program which takes a file of comma-separated first names and delivers a report of the top 5 names by frequency separated by line to stdout
example_output:
44 Marsha
11 Pete
10 Olivia
6 Terry
2 Anisa
1 Flora
